{{'Req. Id: '+tr_id+' | API Status: '+apistatus+' | Remarks: '+remark+' | API Bal: '+apibalance+' | Mobile: '+mobile+' | API Ref. '+api_ref+' | ec: '+ec}}
{{'Req. Id: '+tr_id+' | API Status: '+apistatus+' | Remarks: '+remark+' | API Bal: '+apibalance+' | Mobile: '+mobile+' | API Ref. '+api_ref+' | ec: '+ec}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO api_response
(user_id, recharge_mobile, operator, amount, status, order_id, balance, ec, apirefid) VALUES (:P1 /* {{ec}} */, :P2 /* {{mobile}} */, :P3 /* {{api_ref}} */, :P4 /* {{tr_id}} */, :P5 /* {{apistatus}} */, :P6 /* {{remark}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.DR}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.DP}} */, :P9 /* {{apifiredid}} */)

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountTrIdAll
FROM tt_recharge_trans
WHERE tr_id = :P1 /* {{tr_id}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountIdAEPS
FROM tt_aeps_trans
WHERE tr_id = :P1 /* {{tr_id}} */

SELECT tt_recharge_trans.id, tt_recharge_trans.op_id, tt_recharge_trans.service_id, tt_recharge_trans.api_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_number, tt_recharge_trans.details, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.comm_per, tt_recharge_trans.comm_val, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.other_charge, tt_recharge_trans.charge_per, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.closing_balance, tt_recharge_trans.tr_mode, tt_recharge_trans.tr_type, tt_recharge_trans.status, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id, tt_recharge_trans.reason, tt_recharge_trans.api_logs, tt_recharge_trans.is_processed, tt_recharge_trans.operator_ref, tt_recharge_trans.api_ref, tt_recharge_trans.revert_trans, tt_recharge_trans.ip_address, tt_recharge_trans.api_response_id, tt_recharge_trans.process_mode, tt_recharge_trans.live, tt_recharge_trans.tr_date, tt_recharge_trans.updated_on, tt_recharge_trans.transaction_by, tt_recharge_trans.extra1, tt_recharge_trans.extra2, tt_recharge_trans.extra3, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeamt, mu.user_fname, mu.user_lname, mu.user_mobile, mu.user_email, mu.user_type, mu.md_id, mu.ds_id, mu.u_status, mu.scheme_id, mu.balance_amt, mu.cap_amt, mu.balance_outstanding, mu.aeps_limit, mu.aeps_balance
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_recharge_trans.user_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.tr_id = :P1 /* {{tr_id}} */ AND mu.u_status = '1'

SELECT tt_aeps_trans.id, tt_aeps_trans.service_id, tt_aeps_trans.op_id, tt_aeps_trans.api_id, tt_aeps_trans.user_id, tt_aeps_trans.user_rt_id, tt_aeps_trans.merchant_id, tt_aeps_trans.amount, tt_aeps_trans.op_bal, tt_aeps_trans.comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.net_amt, tt_aeps_trans.closing_bal, tt_aeps_trans.tr_mode, tt_aeps_trans.tr_type, tt_aeps_trans.status, tt_aeps_trans.tr_id, tt_aeps_trans.reason, tt_aeps_trans.api_logs, tt_aeps_trans.is_processed, tt_aeps_trans.operator_ref, tt_aeps_trans.api_ref, tt_aeps_trans.revert_trans, tt_aeps_trans.ip_address, tt_aeps_trans.api_response_time, tt_aeps_trans.process_mode, tt_aeps_trans.live, tt_aeps_trans.tr_date, tt_aeps_trans.trans_by, tt_aeps_trans.updated_on, tt_aeps_trans.updated_by, tt_aeps_trans.ec, tt_aeps_trans.raise_compain, tt_aeps_trans.api_bal, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_amount, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.bank_name, tt_aeps_trans.service_api, tt_aeps_trans.api_tnx_date, tt_aeps_trans.bank_acno, tt_aeps_trans.benef_name, tt_aeps_trans.benef_id, mu.user_fname, mu.user_lname, mu.user_mobile, mu.user_email, mu.user_type, mu.md_id, mu.ds_id, mu.u_status, mu.scheme_id, mu.aeps_limit, mu.aeps_balance
FROM tt_aeps_trans
INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_aeps_trans.user_id)
WHERE tt_aeps_trans.tr_id = :P1 /* {{tr_id}} */

options.value: {{'Req. Id: '+tr_id+' | API Status: '+apistatus+' | Remarks: '+remark+' | API Bal: '+apibalance+' | Mobile: '+mobile+' | API Ref. '+api_ref+' | ec: '+ec+' | API Fired Id: '+apifiredid+' | Amount: '+amount}}

sql.query:
SELECT tt_recharge_trans.id, tt_recharge_trans.op_id, tt_recharge_trans.service_id, tt_recharge_trans.api_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_id, tt_recharge_trans.user_number, tt_recharge_trans.details, tt_recharge_trans.opening_balance, tt_recharge_trans.amount, tt_recharge_trans.comm_per, tt_recharge_trans.comm_val, tt_recharge_trans.comm_amt, tt_recharge_trans.other_charge, tt_recharge_trans.charge_per, tt_recharge_trans.charge_amt, tt_recharge_trans.net_amt, tt_recharge_trans.closing_balance, tt_recharge_trans.tr_mode, tt_recharge_trans.tr_type, tt_recharge_trans.status, tt_recharge_trans.tr_id, tt_recharge_trans.reason, tt_recharge_trans.api_logs, tt_recharge_trans.is_processed, tt_recharge_trans.operator_ref, tt_recharge_trans.api_ref, tt_recharge_trans.revert_trans, tt_recharge_trans.ip_address, tt_recharge_trans.api_response_id, tt_recharge_trans.process_mode, tt_recharge_trans.live, tt_recharge_trans.tr_date, tt_recharge_trans.updated_on, tt_recharge_trans.transaction_by, tt_recharge_trans.extra1, tt_recharge_trans.extra2, tt_recharge_trans.extra3, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.dtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.dtchargeamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtcommamt, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeper, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeval, tt_recharge_trans.mdtchargeamt, mu.user_fname, mu.user_lname, mu.user_mobile, mu.user_email, mu.user_type, mu.md_id, mu.ds_id, mu.u_status, mu.scheme_id, mu.balance_amt, mu.cap_amt, mu.balance_outstanding, mu.aeps_limit, mu.aeps_balance
FROM tt_recharge_trans AS tt_recharge_trans
INNER JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_recharge_trans.user_id)
WHERE tt_recharge_trans.api_ref = :P1 /* {{api_ref}} */ AND mu.u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountTicket
FROM t_ticket
WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */ AND tran_id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE t_ticket
SET status = :P1 /* {{3}} */
WHERE user_id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */ AND tran_id = :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET extra2 = :P1 /* {{3}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, operator_ref = :P2 /* {{remark}} */, api_ref = :P3 /* {{api_ref}} */, live = :P4 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, extra1 = :P6 /* {{ec}} */, extra3 = :P7 /* {{apibalance}} */, is_processed = :P8 /* {{apifiredid ? apifiredid : GetRechTrans.is_processed}} */, blank1 = :P9 /* {{response}} */
WHERE id = :P10 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET updated_on = :P1 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P2 /* {{apistatus}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */, is_processed = :P2 /* {{apifiredid?apifiredid:GetRechTrans.is_processed}} */, operator_ref = :P3 /* {{remark}} */, api_ref = :P4 /* {{api_ref}} */, live = :P5 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, ec = :P7 /* {{ec}} */, api_bal = :P8 /* {{apibalance}} */, blank1 = :P9 /* {{response}} */
WHERE id = :P10 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{apistatus}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

SELECT balance_amt AS latestbal
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

UPDATE tt_recharge_trans
SET closing_balance = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalOld}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, operator_ref = :P3 /* {{remark}} */, api_ref = :P4 /* {{api_ref}} */, live = :P5 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, extra1 = :P7 /* {{ec}} */, extra3 = :P8 /* {{apibalance}} */, is_processed = :P9 /* {{apifiredid ? apifiredid : GetRechTrans.is_processed}} */, blank1 = :P10 /* {{response}} */
WHERE id = :P11 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_balance
SET updated_on = :P1 /* {{NOW}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

INSERT INTO tt_balance
(user_id, old_balance, amount, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on, netamt, status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetBal.latestbal}} */, :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */, :P5 /* {{'Recharge Refund'}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P8 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P9 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P10 /* {{'Number: '+GetRechTrans.user_number+' | Amount: '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Recharge Refund | Ref. Id: '+GetRechTrans.id+' | Order Id: '+GetRechTrans.tr_id+' | Comm Per: '+GetRechTrans.comm_per+' | Comm Val: '+GetRechTrans.comm_val+' | Charge Per: '+GetRechTrans.charge_per+' | Charge Val:  '+GetRechTrans.other_charge+' | GST: 00.00 | TDS: 00.00 | Net Amt. '+GetRechTrans.net_amt}} */, :P11 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */, :P12 /* {{NOW}} */, :P13 /* {{GetRechTrans.net_amt}} */, :P14 /* {{'REFUND'}} */)

UPDATE tt_aeps_trans
SET closing_bal = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBalOld}} */, status = :P2 /* {{'FAILED'}} */, operator_ref = :P3 /* {{remark}} */, api_ref = :P4 /* {{api_ref}} */, live = :P5 /* {{'Push'}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, ec = :P7 /* {{ec}} */, api_bal = :P8 /* {{apibalance}} */, is_processed = :P9 /* {{apifiredid?apifiredid:GetRechTrans.is_processed}} */, blank1 = :P10 /* {{response}} */
WHERE id = :P11 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE tt_aeps_balance
SET status = :P1 /* {{'FAILED'}} */
WHERE pay_ref_id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */

INSERT INTO tt_aeps_balance
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, status, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P3 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P4 /* {{GetRechTrans.aeps_balance}} */, :P5 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P6 /* {{GetRechTrans.net_amt}} */, :P7 /* {{RTClosingBal}} */, :P8 /* {{'REFUND'}} */, :P9 /* {{'AEPS Refund'}} */, :P10 /* {{NOW}} */, :P11 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P12 /* {{'Refund of Amount '+GetRechTrans.net_amt+' | '+remark}} */, :P13 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */)

SELECT balance_amt AS dt_balance
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_charge_cal
(user_id, old_balance, amount, netamt, new_balance, transaction_type, tr_date, ip_address, crdr_type, pay_ref_id, remarks, created_by, created_on) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetDT.dt_balance}} */, :P3 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P4 /* {{DTNetAmt}} */, :P5 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */, :P6 /* {{'Recharge Comm'}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, :P8 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P9 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P10 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P11 /* {{'Recharge Comm | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+DTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P12 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */)

params.name: :P11
params.value: {{'Recharge Comm | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+DTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}}

sql.query:
UPDATE m_users
SET balance_amt = :P1 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

SELECT aeps_balance AS dt_aeps_balance
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

INSERT INTO t_charge_aeps_cal
(user_id, pay_ref_id, crdr_type, old_bal, amount, net_amt, new_bal, tr_type, tr_date, ip_address, remarks, created_by) VALUES (:P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */, :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.id}} */, :P3 /* {{'Credit'}} */, :P4 /* {{GetDT.dt_aeps_balance}} */, :P5 /* {{GetRechTrans.amount}} */, :P6 /* {{DTNetAmt}} */, :P7 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */, :P8 /* {{'AEPS Comm'}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P11 /* {{'Recharge Comm | Net Amount '+DTNetAmt}} */, :P12 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */)

UPDATE m_users
SET aeps_balance = :P1 /* {{DTClosingBal}} */
WHERE id = :P2 /* {{GetRechTrans.ds_id}} */

SELECT balance_amt AS mdt_balance
FROM m_users AS m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.md_id}} */

values.value: {{'Recharge Comm | Amount:  '+GetRechTrans.amount+' | Charge & Comm Debit: '+MDTNetAmt+' | Ref. Id:\n '+GetRechTrans.id}}

WHERE user_id = :P1 /* {{GetRechTrans.user_id}} */
